summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for the account associated with The Haze Trust for the month of July 2018. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest payments, highlighting significant account activity during this period.

persons.name: Steuart Oldfickl
persons.context: Steuart Oldfickl is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account statement.

events.title: Account Statement Summary
events.description: The account statement summarizes the account balance and transactions for The Haze Trust for July 2018, including an interest payment and ending balance.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas 00802, United States Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The account balance for The Haze Trust as of July 31, 2018, was $40,583,100.79.
The account received an interest payment of $561,504.04 during July 2018.
There were no overdraft fees or NSF return item fees for the statement period.
The document outlines the process for disputing errors on the account statement.
The account is not FDIC insured and is subject to the German Deposit Guarantee Act.
